summary: The self-driving car is moving forward on a road with multiple lanes. Initially, a silver car is visible ahead in the same lane. A green and red bus is also ahead in the right lane. From 0.0s to 3.6s, the car maintains its position behind the silver car. At 3.6s, a red car appears from the left side of the road, crossing the lanes. From 5.4s to 7.1s, a person on a bicycle, wearing a red jacket and carrying a basket, crosses the road from left to right. At 7.1s, two people on scooters are visible on the right side of the road, moving in the same direction as the bus.

characters.description: A silver car is driving in the same lane ahead of the self-driving car.
A green and red bus is driving in the right lane ahead of the self-driving car.
A red car is crossing the road from the left side.
A person on a bicycle, wearing a red jacket and carrying a basket, is crossing the road from left to right.
A person on a scooter is driving on the right side of the road.
A person on a scooter is driving on the right side of the road, following the first scooter.

key_objects: [Left]: A red car, approximately 15 meters away, crossing the road from the left side, potentially causing the vehicle to decelerate or stop.
actions: The self-driving car is maintaining its speed and following the lane markings. The driver is likely maintaining a safe distance from the silver car ahead. The driver is driving at a moderate speed to adapt to the traffic conditions and maintain a safe following distance from the vehicle ahead. The driver is staying in the current lane to avoid any sudden maneuvers that could compromise safety.
